changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE station_name ( station_id bigserial NOT NULL, "IMOS_SITE_CODE" text, "STATION_NAME" text, "NODE" text, "STATE" text, "STATION_DEPTH_M" double precision, "LONGITUDE" double precision, "LATITUDE" double precision, "START_DATE" date, geom geometry NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT station_id_pkey PRIMARY KEY (station_id) )

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig ( measurement bigserial NOT NULL, "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL, "NRS_TRIP_CODE" text, "NRS_SAMPLE_CODE" text, "STATION_NAME" text, "IMOS_SITE_CODE" text, "LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" text NOT NULL, "SAMPLE_DEPTH_M" double precision, "CPHL_C3" double precision, "MG_DVP" double precision, "CPHL_C2" double precision, "CPHL_C1" double precision, "CPHL_C1C2" double precision, "CPHLIDE_A" double precision, "PHIDE_A" double precision, "PERID" double precision, "PYROPHIDE_A" double precision, "BUT_FUCO" double precision, "FUCO" double precision, "NEO" double precision, "KETO_HEX_FUCO" double precision, "PRAS" double precision, "VIOLA" double precision, "HEX_FUCO" double precision, "ASTA" double precision, "DIADCHR" double precision, "DIADINO" double precision, "DINO" double precision, "ANTH" double precision, "ALLO" double precision, "DIATO" double precision, "ZEA" double precision, "LUT" double precision, "CANTHA" double precision, "GYRO" double precision, "DV_CPHL_B" double precision, "CPHL_B" double precision, "DV_CPHL_B_AND_CPHL_B" double precision, "DV_CPHL_A" double precision, "CPHL_A" double precision, "DV_CPHL_A_AND_CPHL_A" double precision, "ECHIN" double precision, "PHYTIN_B" double precision, "PHYTIN_A" double precision, "LYCO" double precision, "BETA_EPI_CAR" double precision, "BETA_BETA_CAR" double precision, "ALPHA_BETA_CAR" double precision, "PYROPHYTIN_A" double precision, "QC_FLAG" text, "SAMPLE_COMMENTS" text, CONSTRAINT measurement_pkey_phypig PRIMARY KEY (measurement) )

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig_data ; CREATE VIEW anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig_data as SELECT s."LATITUDE", s."LONGITUDE", s.geom, p.measurement, p."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME", p."LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME", p."NRS_TRIP_CODE", p."NRS_SAMPLE_CODE", s."STATION_NAME", p."IMOS_SITE_CODE", p."SAMPLE_DEPTH_M", p."CPHL_C3", p."MG_DVP", p."CPHL_C2", p."CPHL_C1", p."CPHL_C1C2", p."CPHLIDE_A", p."PHIDE_A", p."PERID", p."PYROPHIDE_A", p."BUT_FUCO", p."FUCO", p."NEO", p."KETO_HEX_FUCO", p."PRAS", p."VIOLA", p."HEX_FUCO", p."ASTA", p."DIADCHR", p."DIADINO", p."DINO", p."ANTH", p."ALLO", p."DIATO", p."ZEA", p."LUT", p."CANTHA", p."GYRO", p."DV_CPHL_B", p."CPHL_B", p."DV_CPHL_B_AND_CPHL_B", p."DV_CPHL_A", p."CPHL_A", p."DV_CPHL_A_AND_CPHL_A", p."ECHIN", p."PHYTIN_B", p."PHYTIN_A", p."LYCO", p."BETA_EPI_CAR", p."BETA_BETA_CAR", p."ALPHA_BETA_CAR", p."PYROPHYTIN_A", p."QC_FLAG", p."SAMPLE_COMMENTS" FROM anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig p LEFT JOIN station_name s USING ("IMOS_SITE_CODE") ORDER BY p."STATION_NAME", p."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME";

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE anmn_nrs_bgc_picoplankton ( measurement bigserial NOT NULL, "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL, "NRS_TRIP_CODE" text, "NRS_SAMPLE_CODE" text, "STATION_NAME" text, "IMOS_SITE_CODE" text, "LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" text NOT NULL, "REPLICATE" text, "PROCHLOROCOCCUS_CELLSPERML" double precision, "SYNECOCHOCCUS_CELLSPERML" double precision, "PICOEUKARYOTES_CELLSPERML" double precision, "PROCHLOROCOCCUS_FLAG" text, "SYNECOCHOCCUS_FLAG" text, "PICOEUKARYOTES_FLAG" text, "SAMPLE_COMMENTS" text, CONSTRAINT measurement_pkey_picoplankton PRIMARY KEY (measurement) )

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS anmn_nrs_bgc_picoplankton_data ; CREATE VIEW anmn_nrs_bgc_picoplankton_data as SELECT s."LATITUDE", s."LONGITUDE", s.geom, p.measurement, p."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME", p."LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" , p."NRS_TRIP_CODE", p."NRS_SAMPLE_CODE", p."STATION_NAME", p."IMOS_SITE_CODE", p."PROCHLOROCOCCUS_CELLSPERML", p."SYNECOCHOCCUS_CELLSPERML", p."PICOEUKARYOTES_CELLSPERML", p."PROCHLOROCOCCUS_FLAG", p."SYNECOCHOCCUS_FLAG", p."PICOEUKARYOTES_FLAG", p."SAMPLE_COMMENTS" FROM anmn_nrs_bgc_picoplankton p LEFT JOIN station_name s USING ("IMOS_SITE_CODE") ORDER BY p."STATION_NAME", p."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME";

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE anmn_nrs_bgc_chemistry ( measurement bigserial NOT NULL, "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL, "NRS_TRIP_CODE" text, "NRS_SAMPLE_CODE" text, "STATION_NAME" text, "IMOS_SITE_CODE" text, "LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" text NOT NULL, "SAMPLE_DEPTH_M" double precision, "SALINITY" double precision, "SALINITY_FLAG" text, "SALINITY_COMMENTS" text, "SILICATE_UMOL_PER_L" double precision, "SILICATE_FLAG" text, "NITRATE_UMOL_PER_L" double precision, "NITRATE_FLAG" text, "PHOSPHATE_UMOL_PER_L" double precision, "PHOSPHATE_FLAG" text, "AMMONIUM_UMOL_PER_L" double precision, "AMMONIUM_FLAG" text, "NUTRIENT_COMMENTS" text, "TCO2_UMOL_PER_KG" double precision, "CARBON_FLAG" text, "CARBON_COMMENTS" text, "TALKALINITY_UMOL_PER_KG" double precision, "ALKALINITY_FLAG" text, "ALKALINITY_COMMENTS" text, "OXYGEN_UMOL_PER_L" double precision, "OXYGEN_FLAG" text, "OXYGEN_COMMENTS" text, CONSTRAINT measurement_pkey_chemistry PRIMARY KEY (measurement) )

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS anmn_nrs_bgc_chemistry_data ; CREATE VIEW anmn_nrs_bgc_chemistry_data AS SELECT s."LATITUDE", s."LONGITUDE", s.geom, c.measurement, c."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME", c."LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" , c."NRS_TRIP_CODE", c."NRS_SAMPLE_CODE", c."STATION_NAME", c."IMOS_SITE_CODE", c."SAMPLE_DEPTH_M", c."SALINITY", c."SALINITY_FLAG", c."SALINITY_COMMENTS", c."SILICATE_UMOL_PER_L", c."SILICATE_FLAG", c."NITRATE_UMOL_PER_L", c."NITRATE_FLAG", c."PHOSPHATE_UMOL_PER_L", c."PHOSPHATE_FLAG", c."AMMONIUM_UMOL_PER_L", c."AMMONIUM_FLAG", c."NUTRIENT_COMMENTS", c."TCO2_UMOL_PER_KG", c."CARBON_FLAG", c."CARBON_COMMENTS", c."TALKALINITY_UMOL_PER_KG", c."ALKALINITY_FLAG", c."ALKALINITY_COMMENTS", c."OXYGEN_UMOL_PER_L", c."OXYGEN_FLAG", c."OXYGEN_COMMENTS" FROM anmn_nrs_bgc_chemistry c LEFT JOIN station_name s USING ("IMOS_SITE_CODE") ORDER BY c."STATION_NAME", c."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME";

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_biomass ( measurement bigserial NOT NULL, "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL, "NRS_TRIP_CODE" text, "NRS_SAMPLE_CODE" text, "STATION_NAME" text, "IMOS_SITE_CODE" text, "LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" text, "LONGITUDE" double precision, "LATITUDE" double precision, "MG_PER_M3" double precision, CONSTRAINT measurement_pkey_plankton_biomass PRIMARY KEY (measurement) )

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_biomass_data ; CREATE VIEW anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_biomass_data as SELECT s.geom, b."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME", b."LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" , b."NRS_TRIP_CODE", b."NRS_SAMPLE_CODE", b."STATION_NAME", b."IMOS_SITE_CODE", s."LONGITUDE", s."LATITUDE", b."MG_PER_M3" FROM anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_biomass b LEFT JOIN station_name s USING ("IMOS_SITE_CODE") ORDER BY b."STATION_NAME", b."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME";

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton ( measurement bigserial NOT NULL, "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL, "NRS_TRIP_CODE" text, "NRS_SAMPLE_CODE" text, "STATION_NAME" text, "IMOS_SITE_CODE" text, "LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" text, "LONGITUDE" double precision, "LATITUDE" double precision, "TAXON_NAME" text, "FAMILY" text, "GENUS" text, "SPECIES" text, "SEX" text, "LIFE_STAGE" text, "TAXON_GROUP" text, "TAXON_ECO_GROUP" text, "CAAB_CODE" double precision, "TAXON_START_DATE" text, "TAXON_PER_M3" double precision, "SAMPLE_COMMENTS" text, CONSTRAINT measurement_pkey_plankton_zooplankton PRIMARY KEY (measurement) )

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE nrs_zoop_taxon_changelog ( "TAXON_NAME" text NOT NULL, "TAXON_START_DATE" date, "FIRST_OCCURRENCE" date, "PARENT_TAXON_NAME" text NOT NULL, "TRAINING" text, "COMMENTS" text, CONSTRAINT nrs_zoop_taxon_changelog_pkey PRIMARY KEY ("TAXON_NAME") )

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton_data ; CREATE VIEW anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton_data as SELECT s.geom, z.measurement, z."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME", z."LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" , z."NRS_TRIP_CODE", z."NRS_SAMPLE_CODE", z."STATION_NAME", z."IMOS_SITE_CODE", s."LONGITUDE", s."LATITUDE", z."TAXON_NAME", z."FAMILY", z."GENUS", z."SPECIES", z."GENUS" || ' ' || z."SPECIES" AS genus_and_species, z."SEX", z."LIFE_STAGE", z."TAXON_GROUP", z."TAXON_ECO_GROUP", z."CAAB_CODE", z."TAXON_START_DATE", z."TAXON_PER_M3", z."SAMPLE_COMMENTS" FROM anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton z LEFT JOIN station_name s USING ("IMOS_SITE_CODE") ORDER BY z."STATION_NAME", z."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME";

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton ( measurement bigserial NOT NULL, "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL, "NRS_TRIP_CODE" text, "NRS_SAMPLE_CODE" text, "STATION_NAME" text, "IMOS_SITE_CODE" text, "LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" text, "LONGITUDE" double precision, "LATITUDE" double precision, "TAXON_NAME" text, "FAMILY" text, "GENUS" text, "SPECIES" text, "TAXON_ECO_GROUP" text, "CAAB_CODE" double precision, "TAXON_START_DATE" text, "CELL_PER_LITRE" double precision, "BIOVOLUME_ML_PER_L" double precision, "SAMPLE_COMMENTS" text, CONSTRAINT measurement_pkey_plankton_phytoplankton PRIMARY KEY (measurement) )

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE nrs_phyto_taxon_changelog ( "TAXON_NAME" text NOT NULL, "TAXON_START_DATE" date, "FIRST_OCCURRENCE" date, "PARENT_TAXON_NAME" text NOT NULL, "TRAINING" text, "COMMENTS" text, CONSTRAINT nrs_phyto_taxon_changelog_pkey PRIMARY KEY ("TAXON_NAME") )

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton_data ; CREATE VIEW anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton_data as SELECT s.geom, p.measurement, p."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME", p."LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" , p."NRS_TRIP_CODE", p."NRS_SAMPLE_CODE", p."STATION_NAME", p."IMOS_SITE_CODE", p."LONGITUDE", p."LATITUDE", p."TAXON_NAME", p."FAMILY", p."GENUS", p."SPECIES", p."TAXON_ECO_GROUP", p."CAAB_CODE", p."TAXON_START_DATE", p."CELL_PER_LITRE", p."BIOVOLUME_ML_PER_L", p."SAMPLE_COMMENTS" FROM anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton p LEFT JOIN station_name s USING ("IMOS_SITE_CODE") ORDER BY p."STATION_NAME", p."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME";

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi ( measurement bigserial NOT NULL, "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL, "NRS_TRIP_CODE" text, "NRS_SAMPLE_CODE" text, "STATION_NAME" text, "IMOS_SITE_CODE" text, "LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" text NOT NULL, "REPLICATE" text, "TSS_MG_PER_L" double precision, "INORGANIC_FRACTION_MG_PER_L" double precision, "ORGANIC_FRACTION_MG_PER_L" double precision, "TSS_FLAG" text, "TSS_COMMENTS" text, "SECCHI_DEPTH_M" double precision, "SECCHI_FLAG" text, "SECCHI_COMMENTS" text, CONSTRAINT measurement_pkey_tss_secchi PRIMARY KEY (measurement) )

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi_data ; CREATE VIEW anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi_data as SELECT s."LATITUDE", s."LONGITUDE", s.geom, t.measurement, t."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME", t."LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" , t."NRS_TRIP_CODE", t."NRS_SAMPLE_CODE", t."STATION_NAME", t."IMOS_SITE_CODE", t."REPLICATE", t."TSS_MG_PER_L", t."INORGANIC_FRACTION_MG_PER_L", t."ORGANIC_FRACTION_MG_PER_L", t."TSS_FLAG", t."TSS_COMMENTS", t."SECCHI_DEPTH_M", t."SECCHI_FLAG", t."SECCHI_COMMENTS" FROM anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi t LEFT JOIN station_name s USING ("IMOS_SITE_CODE") ORDER BY t."STATION_NAME", t."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME";

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE qc_flags ( "QC_FLAG" text NOT NULL, "FLAG_DESCRIPTION" text, CONSTRAINT qc_flags_pkey PRIMARY KEY ("QC_FLAG") )
